title: PING Increased in the Pass few weeks in GA, USA Area: xfinity, Comcast
body:
My pings are usually in the lower 30s but recently, for the past weeks or so it jump to mid 45s. I can certainly feel the difference in Ping as I play {{champion:126}} . I've made a post on Reddit asking if anyone in the GA, USA area if they have similar issues & people are experiencing the same problem.

Is there anything on RIOT's end to Fix this? I really miss having the Lower ping.
Thanks

replies.body: Don't feel bad my internet is way crappier.  My average pings usually 60-80, and today like just now, it jumped to 1k.  I don't now what happened, but I've been getting lag everyday.  Is it just because the servers are currently bad? New update? or what. So i totally agree with you about this.

The increase in ping could be due to a few reasons like an issue with your network reaching our servers, but it could certainly be a result of the routing your ISP is taking too.  As a first step, I suggest using our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to strengthen your connection.  This should hopefully fix you up, but let me know if you still have any issues and we can go from there!

So far...

* I've Turn off my Modem for 5mins & Plug it back In... Doesn't Work
* Run Hextech Repair Tool as Administrator, League added to Firewall... Doesn't Work
* Turn OFF Windows Firewall... Still Doesn't Work
* Disabled AVG Anti-Virus... Doesn't Work

Anything I need to Do?
